description: A Boundary plugin for Tomcat that collects metrics from the Manager App status page

paramSchema.description: Host where Apache Tomcat is running
paramSchema.name: host
paramSchema.title: Host

paramSchema.description: Port where Apache Tomcat is running
paramSchema.name: port
paramSchema.title: Port

paramSchema.description: Path to the Tomcat Manager App status page (ie. /manager/status).
paramSchema.name: path
paramSchema.title: Path

paramSchema.description: Username with access to the Tomcat Manager App
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.title: Username

paramSchema.description: Password for the Tomcat Mannager App
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.title: Password

paramSchema.description: The Poll Interval to call the command. Defaults 5 seconds
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.title: Poll Time (ms)
